Title: Promise
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Timothy J. Sexton, Gwen Sigan (story editor), Kinan Copen (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: A young Latina woman is brutally murdered and it's suspected she have been working as a drug mule until a different motive for her death is discovered.
